groups.name: quickpay.logging.ecs
groups.description: Elastic Common Schema (ECS) configuration. ECS format is always enforced when QuickPay logging is enabled.

groups.name: quickpay.logging.correlation
groups.description: Transaction correlation configuration for distributed tracing.

groups.name: quickpay.logging.service
groups.description: Service identification and metadata configuration for log correlation.

properties.name: quickpay.logging.enabled
properties.description: Whether QuickPay ECS logging is enabled (master switch).

properties.name: quickpay.logging.ecs.pii-masking
properties.description: Whether to automatically mask PII data in logs for security compliance. ECS format is always enforced regardless of this setting.

properties.name: quickpay.logging.correlation.header-name
properties.description: HTTP header name for transaction ID extraction.

properties.name: quickpay.logging.correlation.generate-if-missing
properties.description: Whether to generate transaction ID if not present in request.

properties.name: quickpay.logging.correlation.add-to-response
properties.description: Whether to add transaction ID to response headers.

properties.name: quickpay.logging.service.name
properties.description: Service name for identification in logs and monitoring systems.

properties.name: quickpay.logging.service.version
properties.description: Service version for deployment tracking and troubleshooting.
